sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProductDetail = () => { const { product_id } = useParams(); const [productDetail, setProductDetail] = useState([]); console.log(product_id) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/products/${product_id}`) .then(response => { setProductDetail(response.data); }) .catch (error => { console.log("Lỗi khi gọi api detail product!", error) }); }, [product_id]); return (

{productDetail.product_name ? productDetail.product_name : ""}

{productDetail.brand_name}
{productDetail.price} VND {productDetail.old_price} VND
Thêm vào giỏ hàng Thanh toán ngay
) } export default ProductDetail
